charges.charge_description: 21 USC 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B)(iii) DISTRIBUTION OF FIVE (5) GRAMS OR MORE OF A MIXTURE AND SUBSTANCE CONTAINING A DETECTABLE AMOUNT OF COCAINE BASE, IN THE FORM COMMONLY KNOWN AS CRACK(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of sixty (60) months w/recommendations more fully stated in the Judgment; Five (5) years Supervised Release w/standard and additional conditions; No Restitution; Fine waived; $100.00 Special Assessment, due immediately.
